name: Aisha Rahman
persona: Aisha Rahman is a 21-year-old Biomedical Engineering major known for her exceptional academic record and dedication. She is highly motivated to achieve top grades and consistently demonstrates strong self-discipline and perseverance in her studies. Aisha approaches challenges with confidence and manages exam stress effectively, allowing her to excel both in coursework and research projects. Her conscientious approach makes her a reliable team member and a role model for her peers.
